descriptions.content: The Selector is a function which mapping an input value to an output value.
The function accept one or more arguments, sometimes, it also accept index of the collection as argument.

contents.title: Use string/number/symbol value to replace the Selector

descriptions.content: You can use a string or a number or a symbol value to replace an Unary Selector, the examples following will show you how to use string or number value to replace the Selector
